## Learning Objectives

By the end of this lesson students will be able to:

1. Describe the main sections of a data management plan
2. Justify the use of data standards within agricultural/natural resources research
3. Write a data managment plan for their own project

## Lesson Outline

\setlength{\baselineskip}{1.5\baselineskip}

- Review Learning Objectives and Agenda (9:00)
- Review readings:

    - ICASA Standards (9:05)
    - Data Management Plan Rubric (9:10)

- Questions/Discussion/Independent work (9:15)
- Review Learning Objectives (10:10)
